title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 58.1 - Individual accredited herd plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 58.1 - Individual accredited herd plan

State Regulations
(a) A tuberculosis-free accredited herd of
cattle is one in which the entire herd has passed two negative annual physical
examinations and tuberculin tests. (b) To maintain a fully accredited status, a
herd must be tested annually. (c) Accredited herd certificates will be issued only upon request, and shall be
valid for one year unless revoked. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
58.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
